item.title: Me playing Dark Souls PC Live...
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Okay, I’ve been doing fairly regular casts, but here’s a fairly good quality stream of Sniper Elite V2. Can we rename this thread to “k3nny1550 Livestream Thread” or something? I need to get back to Dark Souls eventually, I might just wait until after GFWL is removed.

item.title: Me playing Dark Souls PC Live...
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Double post because bumping thread. Tonight I’ll be trying out Titanfall and streaming it live, but since it doesn’t have the Dark Souls problem of no full-screen, I should be able to do an HD recording of the game with ShadowPlay at the same time. Will update this post with time/ direct link to the archived video/ HD upload to YouTube as completed. Could someone rename this thread to fit my edit to the OP?

EDIT #3: Direct link to my play session. 5.5 straight hours of Titanfall with my thoughts on the game interspersed throughout.

Read full topic
